3: 'Static Seal'. That is how I will cure the Punishing Virus.
Every single sand carries millions of these 'Static Seal' nanobots.
They flow with the wind and suppress the Punishing Virus in the air.

4: Sounds to me like you've figured out how to save the world.

3: You are not wrong... To completely reclaim Earth and cure the virus... we will need to set up Golden Vortexes all over the planet.
As you can see, I have already built this one with my own resources.
Combining the technological prowess and armed troops of Babylonia, we can speed up their construction while making sure they are protected.
And you, Commandant, are the key to my conversation with Babylonia.
You come with certain freedom within the hierarchy of the political powers of Babylonia.
If you can present the Golden Vortex to the Science Council, I guarantee you they will be impressed by my design!
From what I know of the Council, they probably have tried this already.
They're the Science Council, after all.
Enough! That is all I have to say.
You have a brief window to consider, Commandant.
Now, excuse me... There is something trivial I have to take care of.
